content.value:
Casa Torices Real is in Cartagena de Indias , just 1 km from the beach , where you can enjoy a wide variety of activities, and 500 meters from the transport services connecting to Santa Marta and Barranquilla. This hotel offers free WiFi .

Casa Torices Real has 5 rooms. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is featured.

Private bathroom also comes with a shower. Extras include bed linen and a fan.

At Casa Torices you will find a garden, a terrace and a shared kitchen. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a games room and a tour desk. The property offers free parking.
If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out San Felipe de Barajas Castle (2.6 km) and Cartagena's Walls (1.7 km).

description.description: Casa Torices Real has a garden , a terrace and a shared kitchen. There is also shared lounge, games room, tour desk and free parking. Linen and fan is provided. The peaceful Casa Torices is located in Cartagena de Indias just 1 km from the beach where you can enjoy a variety of activities, and 500 m from the transport services to Santa Marta and Barranquilla. Free WiFi access is available in this homestay.
